scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start:db: cd backend && npx prisma dev && npx prisma studio
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:db" --names "SERVER,CLIENT,DB-UI" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green"
scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose --env-file .env.docker exec backend npx prisma db seed
